QuestData.Title: The Final Ritual
QuestData.Description: The knife is ready. Loramus is present, and he knows what he must do. I must now take the three amulets and use their enchantment to grant you access to Razelikh, the amulets' creator.$b$bI am prepared to perform the ritual on you and Loramus. Speak with me when you are both ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kasim Sharim and participate in his ritual.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Loramus Thalipedes in the Serpent's Coil in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Quickly, friend. This is but the calm before the storm.
QuestData.RewardText: It would seem that we are prepared to face our demon, $n. We have the amulet's blessing, we have the stone knife, and I alone know the demon's true name: Rakh'likh. Together, this may be enough to defeat the Defiler.
